column1: # "Measuring the time atoms spend in the excited state due to a photon they do not absorb"
# Extracted experimental data for Collapse Integrity audit
# - τ_T = excitation time for transmitted photons
# - τ_0 = excitation time for average incident photon
# τ_R (return delay) = τ_T - τ_0 (normalized to τ_0 = 1)
# D_C (curvature) derived from phase geometry φ_T/φ_0
